All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
Represents a bishop piece in chess.
Board
Chessboard with an 8x8 grid of pieces plus basic move/capture logic.
Board.Color
Color enum used by isCheck / isCheckmate.
Game
Controls the flow of a chess game.
King
Represents a king piece in chess.
Knight
Represents a knight piece in chess.
Pawn
Represents a pawn piece in chess.
Piece
Base class for all chess pieces.
Player
Represents a chess player ("white" or "black").
Position
Represents a coordinate (row and column) on the chessboard.
Queen
Represents a queen piece in chess.
Rook
Represents a rook piece in chess.
